name: BLOCKY.GO!
description:
BLOCKY.GO! is a single player platformer game made by the TikTok community where they give ideas and then those ideas get put in the game, with great graphics and every map with a different difficulty ! Definitely not based on a youtuber that talks about milk that had the idea to make a parkour game off the comment section of every video. I don't copy, NEVER

Features


    6 levels

    3 different skins

    Is hard

    You can shoot at some stuff with a gun

    Has a new movement system

    Takes more than a hour to beat (minus the raging)





So what are you waiting for ? Go ahead and jump in the action for free!
